max_age.description: This property specifies HTTP Strict Transport Security max age.
max_age.title: HSTS max age

path.description: This object contains information about paths to be used for the various configurations.

cert.description: This property specifies the path for the HTTPS certificate.
cert.title: HTTPS certificate

key.description: This property specifies the path for the HTTPS key.
key.title: HTTPS key

path.title: Paths configuration object

port.description: This object contains information about ports to be used for the various supported protocols.

http.description: This property specifies the port to use for HTTP connections.
http.title: HTTP port

https.description: This property specifies the port to use for HTTPS connections.
https.title: HTTPS port

port.title: Ports configuration object
